name: AmbientVisionsFireplace
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fire place
des:
Fireplace Skill is part of Ambient Visions, your best source for relaxation videos, sounds, and music on Alexa. This Skill has dozens of stunning background videos, to help you relax, sleep, focus, and de-stress.

Get stunning ocean views, relaxing fire places and many more ambient videos for your Alexa screen devices. All videos play for 1 hour straight. On devices without a screen, you get nature and relaxation sounds for relaxation and better sleep. Enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
